result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Charles Michael Star

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Charles Michael Star appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Sam Obscherning in court for Charles Michael Star.  Prosecuting attorney Foley J. Van Lieshout Ms. in court for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for status. Defendant has another pending matter before this Court that has been adjourned. This case to follow. Case adjourned. Case remains calendared in Br 15.
Status conference scheduled for November 8, 2022 at 09:30 am.

Defendant Charles Michael Star in court, in custody.  Attorney Sam Obscherning in court for Charles Michael Star.  Prosecuting attorney Navjot Singh Hira in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for a motion hearing. Defendant filed a motion on 22CM1695. Discussion held. Defense has discovery on all three cases. Defense remains as counsel on 21CM2530 and this case. Case adjourned for a status conference.
Status conference scheduled for September 28, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Charles Michael Star not in court, in custody.  Attorney Sam Obscherning in court for Charles Michael Star.  Prosecuting attorney Navjot Singh Hira in court for the State of Wisconsin. Court waives defendant's appearance for today's proceedings. Case in court for status. Defense informs the Court the Defendant has filed a motion to go pro se on this case and requests he be withdrawn. Court orders this case set for a decision on the motion and orders the Defendant be present in court in person. Case remains calendared in Br. 15.
Motion hearing scheduled for September 22, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

Attorney Sam Obscherning in court, defendant Charles Michael Star not in court, in custody.  Navjot Singh Hira appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
HEARING HELD VIA ZOOM/ LIVE STREAMING THROUGH DACAST. Case in court for a Pretrial Conference.
Discussion held off the record. Defense in receipt of discovery and s global offer and request time to review and discuss with the defendant. 
Effective  July 30, 2022  this calendar will be assigned to Judge JD Watts, Branch 15  in Room 623 of the Courthouse.
  Status conference scheduled for August 30, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with HM (d.o.b. 9/3/03); Quick Pick Food Mart, 2401 S. Howell Ave., Milwaukee, WI, 53207
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.  The Court ordered defendant to maintain ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY.

Defendant Charles Michael Star in court with Student Intern Meghan DeVol under the supervision of Attorney Colleen A Taylor.  Defendant Charles Michael Star in custody.  Gregg Herman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Charles Michael Star appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant has lower number case  21CM2530 pending.  Defendant is advised this case is reassigned to Judge Ashley, Branch 19. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant pled not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Case is adjourned to Br. 19 for pretrial.  This hearing may be streamed live through DACAST at the Court's discretion: 
https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/21a87aec-ffb6-5325-fb81-55812563aa79  Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 18, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
